info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:24AM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are in store for today out of the total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. Most of the snow accumulation is expected tonight through midday Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures are expected to continue today as highs struggle to reach freezing from morning lows in the single digits to low teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Plan on extra travel time within snow. Be sure to bundle up in layers and cover outer extremities if outside.
